title: In Cleveland, They’re Cooking Up a Gay Neighborhood From Scratch
description: Restaurants, kitchen classes and gardening are key parts of an effort to create an L.G.B.T.Q. district that can help lift the area’s economy.
dc:creator: Erik Piepenburg
media:credit: Daniel Lozada for The New York Times
media:description: The opening weekend at the Fieldhouse, a new L.G.B.T.Q. entertainment complex in Lakewood, Ohio, a Cleveland suburb, featured drag performances by “RuPaul’s Drag Race” stars and local artists.
